patterns: what are required documents for B.tech admissions?
responses:
1.SSC( ORIGINAL)
2.INTERMEDIATE/ EQUIVALENT FROM TS-INTERMEDIATE BOARD (IF STUDY IN OTHER STATE)
3.TRANSFER CERTIFICATE
4.EAMCET /JEE/ ECET( HALL TICKET & RANK CARD)
5.BONAFIDE / STUDY CERTIFICATE (ORIGINAL)
6.MIGRATION CERTIFICATE (IF STUDY IN OTHER STATE)
7.SIX PASSPORT SIZE PHOTOS
8.THREE SETS OF XEROX COPIES OF ALL CERTIFICATES
9.AADHAR CARD XEROX (THREE COPIES)

patterns: what are the requirements to seek admission under management quota ?
requirements to get admission under management quota
responses: A student should either have obtained a rank or should have secured a minimum aggregate percentage of 50% in group subjects (Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry) in the Intermediate Examination of the Board of Intermediate Education, Government of Telangana or any other examination recognized by the Government of Telangana as its equivalent.

patterns: what is the minimum requirement of attendance percentage ?
responses: The continuous evaluation system adopted by the college clearly expects every student to be responsible for regularity in classrooms, internal tests and other tasks assigned to him/her in the course. As such, students are advised not to remain absent without submission of leave letter to the respective Mentors.

2.Conferred Autonomous Status by University Grants Commission,New Delhi
3.Accredited by National Assessment and Accreditation Council, Bengaluru
4.Accredited by National Board of Accreditation, New Delhi
5.Approved by Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Hyderabad
6.Certified ISO 9001: 2015 and 14001 : 2015

->CMR Technical Campus is ranked 201-250 Band in Engineering category as per National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF) -2021, Ministry of Education (MoE), Govt. of India.\n->CMR Technical Campus is ranked 201-250 Band in Engineering category as per National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF) -2022, Ministry of Education (MoE), Govt. of India.
->CMR Technical Campus (CMRTC), is categorized as 'Band-Excellent'institution in category of 'Private or Self-Financed College/Institutes' in Atal Ranking of Institutions on Innovation Achievement (ARIIA) - 2021, initiative of Ministry of Education (MoE), Govt. of India, implemented through AICTE and MoE's Innovation Cell.
->CMR Technical Campus, is categorized as 'Band C' institution (rank between 51-75) in category of 'Private or Self-Financed College/Institutes' in Atal Ranking of Institutions on Innovation Achievement (ARIIA) -2020, initiative of Ministry of Education (MoE), Govt. of India, implemented through AICTE and MoE's Innovation Cell.
